meanings.definition: The quality or state of being goofy or silly.
meanings.sent1: Her goofinesses always make everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The children's goofinesses brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: His goofinesses at the party were contagious.
meanings.sent4: The goofinesses of the clown entertained the audience.
meanings.sent5: The goofinesses of the puppy were endearing.

meanings.definition: Actions or behavior that is silly or foolish.
meanings.sent1: The goofinesses of the comedian had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes, a bit of goofinesses can lighten the mood.
meanings.sent3: The goofinesses of the situation made it hard to keep a straight face.
meanings.sent4: His goofinesses were like a breath of fresh air in the office.
meanings.sent5: The goofinesses of the prank were harmless fun.
